body: Oh orukoa has been doing some really nice and more vanilla stuff lately, personally I like this better than thier series of "A Dirty Manga About a Boy Who Got Abandoned and Is Waiting for Someone To Save Him". i hope this doesn't end up like "Inaka no Uke Shounen to Tokai no Seme Shounen no Ero", it started really innocent and cute but in chapter 8 it all went to shit :(
